channel.title: Not Losing Items in Tzaar Fight Caves and Fight Pits
channel.description: Ok I want to make it so that in Tzaar Fight Caves and Fight Pits so you don't lose items. I want it to Teleport you right outside the waiting room for fight pits and outside for the fight caves. After I get the cords for inside and where to teleport what do I do?

item.title: Not Losing Items in Tzaar Fight Caves and Fight Pits
item.dc:creator: @bballman28 bballman28
item.description:
@bballman28 wrote:

Yes I know that lol, but thanks for the concern.

Read full topic

item.title: Not Losing Items in Tzaar Fight Caves and Fight Pits
item.dc:creator: @Gh0st_Jr Gh0st Jr
item.description:
@Gh0st_Jr wrote:

no you dont lose your items… it keeps all equiped. and look for something like this: if (SafeMyLife == true) { ApplyRingOfLife(); } and press enter one then paste the code… or if you already have it look for If killed apply dead

Read full topic
item.source: Not Losing Items in Tzaar Fight Caves and Fight Pits

item.title: Not Losing Items in Tzaar Fight Caves and Fight Pits
item.dc:creator: @bballman28 bballman28
item.description:
@bballman28 wrote:

Gh0st Jr. Where should I put that. Also you don’t lose items right? Sorry for the nooby question.

Read full topic
item.source: Not Losing Items in Tzaar Fight Caves and Fight Pits

item.title: Not Losing Items in Tzaar Fight Caves and Fight Pits
item.dc:creator: @Gh0st_Jr Gh0st Jr
item.description:
@Gh0st_Jr wrote:

// If killed apply dead if ((absX >= 2375 && absX <= 2418 && absY >= 5129 && absY <= 5167 && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]); playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); refreshSkills(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; teleportToX = 2445; teleportToY = 5177; sendMessage("you have died at the fight pits, log out and in to move."); }valid coords for pits/caves.

Read full topic
item.source: Not Losing Items in Tzaar Fight Caves and Fight Pits
